name: Time Thief Temporwhal
text: You can Tribute this card, then target 1 monster your opponent controls; banish it until the End Phase. If this card is in your GY: You can target 1 "Time Thief" monster you control, except "Time Thief Temporwhal"; return it to the hand, and if you do, Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Time Thief Temporwhal" once per turn.
